fields.Name: TestEntityDataGrid
fields.Description: Test harness for EntityDataGrid component using Action Params entity (~1800 rows). Demonstrates both full cache mode (with filter) and partial cache mode (no filter) for testing pagination, sorting, filtering, and cache behavior.
fields.Title: EntityDataGrid Test Harness
fields.FunctionalRequirements: Test component to validate EntityDataGrid functionality with real MJ data. Two side-by-side grids: LEFT GRID (Partial Cache Mode) shows ALL Action Params (~1800 rows) with no extraFilter, enters partial cache mode (maxCachedRows=1000), tests server-side pagination/sorting/caching. RIGHT GRID (Full Cache Mode) shows filtered Action Params (Type='User Defined'), should have < 1000 rows entering full cache mode, tests client-side instant sort/filter/pagination. Includes test controls for toggling indicators/warnings, adjusting cache limits, and event log for monitoring cache hits, page loads, and mode transitions.
fields.TechnicalDesign: React component with two EntityDataGrid instances and test controls. State management for showIndicators, showWarnings, cacheLimit. Two-column layout with EntityDataGrid instances. Controls panel with toggles and cache limit input. Event logging to console and display panel showing cache mode changes, page loads, and cache hit/miss status. Left grid: entityName='Action Params', no extraFilter. Right grid: entityName='Action Params', extraFilter="Type='User Defined'". Both grids expose all test-relevant events and props.
